ingredients.content: 50 g Edam cheese, cut in pieces
120 g sardines in oil, tinned, drained

preparations.content: Place cheese in mixing bowl and chop <b>10 sec/speed 8<b>.
Add sardines, butter, shallot, lemon juice, paprika, salt and pepper then mix <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula. Mix again <b>10 sec/speed 4<b>.
Use as a filling for sandwiches, or as a dip for pitta bread and crudités.
